website_summaries.verdict: The Nokia Lumia 925 is a tricked-out Windows Phone with a nice camera, but it's decidedly midrange next to a range of powerful Android phones on AT&T;.
pros: Sleek, matte black, partially metal design
cons: Not as powerful as high-end Android phones
Some popular apps are still missing from Windows Phone Marketplace

customer_reviews.title: Love it - bought two!
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this phone is wonderful! Great feel to the phone, pretty easy to use. My only gripe is that the antenna isn't as good as the cheap phone I used to have. But since I primarily got this phone to replace my tablet, I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nokia is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is resilient! Was demagnetized shortly after I got it, blank screen for several days but I let it rest and it fixed itself. Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Latre Wade

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I expected and it shipped in time too. Very gorgeous phone. While ordering I was worried I would get a refurbished piece. But nope, got a brand new piece. Very smooth. The camera is too good. worth buying for the price. I love the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: GOOD NIGHT AND RECEIVED THE PHONE Nokia Lumia 925 Q ...
customer_reviews.text: GOOD NIGHT AND RECEIVED THE PHONE Nokia Lumia 925 Q WHAT NOT UNDERSTAND THAT WINE IS NOT LOCKED UNLOCKED AS SAID THERE. NOT WORK HERE IN VENEZUELA. THANK YOU SEND ME URGENT CODE. sterjim1@hotmail.com THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Esther Virginia Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This and the 1520 are the best phones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brodie

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: Shipping fast. When i got phone as 2days i older .Phone love it 😊 work well.update to 8.1 system smooth. Love Lumia phone.
customer_reviews.author: usboy

customer_reviews.title: IT LOOKS GOOD. OVERALL I'M HAPPY I MADE THIS PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: THE PHONE IS USER FRIENDLY. IT LOOKS GOOD. OVERALL I'M HAPPY I MADE THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Seller recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The seller "VC Sales" is to be recommended. The item was as described and the shipping was enormously fast. I've received it in two days. I love all Lumia, phones, so there is nothing to add. The phone is working, and that's important. It's unlocked from AT&T, and I'm using it on Lycamobile.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Everything expected!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I expected and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had more scratches than what actually described. Also said no scratch on the screen, but it has.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Phone came exactly on time and is exactly what is described. Works like a charm, Satisfied for sure and would definetley buy it again
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service, but Nokia was more deteriorated than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ellen Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Lumia
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Lumia I've owned. The best part of this phone is that if someone texts me while I'm driving, I can listen and respond through my cards blue tooth connection without ever touching anything. It's all done vocally. No preloaded responses. It takes great pictures and the battery lasts a long time. The only downfall is the preloaded ringtones suck. There's not one ring tone on here with any kind of volume, and since my ears don't work so good, this is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: sam61

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone. Does what I need
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Does what I need. Not very compatible with other peopele's phones, being a Windows phone, the apps are different than your friends and family (Android, Iphone). Some written instructions would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is excellent. Has exceeded all of my expectations. So excited!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jean

customer_reviews.title: best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. The WP is a great UI experience.i wish the camera was alot better( need more pixels). the app gap some times make it hard to compete.any it is fast phone and never lag.
customer_reviews.author: LaserTech

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in like new condition, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone is great! the phone is nice and lite and with ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great ! the phone is nice and lite and with Cortana on the phone now the phone got even better.
customer_reviews.author: Grant M Savage

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 925 16GB Unlocked GSM 4G LTE Windows 8 Smartphone w/ 8MP Camera - Black - AT&T - No Warranty
feature_bullets: 4.5" AMOLED Multi-Touchscreen with PureMotion HD+ ClearBlack display and Corning Gorilla Glass 2
8 Megapixel (3264 x 2448 pixels) with Carl Zeiss optics, OIS, Dual-LED Flash + 1.3 Megapixel Camera
Microsoft Windows Phone 8 (upgradeable to WP8), Qualcomm MSM8960 Snapdragon, Dual-core 1.5 GHz Krait Processor
16 GB, 1 GB RAM, Non-removable Li-Ion 2000 mAh Battery

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
